LanguageData.Sideria_Weapon_Atzgand.label: Atzgand
LanguageData.Sideria_Weapon_Atzgand.description: A legendary longsword forged from crystallized dragon blood and bound with ancient vampiric magic. The blade pulses with crimson energy and is covered with thorn-like protrusions. It drinks the blood of its foes, empowering its wielder.
LanguageData.Sideria_Weapon_BloodDagger.label: blood dagger
LanguageData.Sideria_Weapon_BloodDagger.description: A curved dagger infused with blood magic. Faster but less powerful than the legendary Atzgand.

LanguageData.Sideria_BloodThornKnightStart.label: BloodThorn Knight
LanguageData.Sideria_BloodThornKnightStart.descriptio: The legendary BloodThorn Knight, Sideria, arrives on this rimworld seeking a new purpose. She carries Atzgand, her biocodded blade that resonates with her blood essence.
LanguageData.Sideria_BloodThornKnightStart.scenario.s: One legendary warrior with her living blade.
LanguageData.Sideria_WandererKnight_LetterText:
A lone wandering knight has arrived at the edge of your colony. She appears to be unarmed and weary from a long journey.

She introduces herself as Sideria, a fallen knight who lost her legendary weapon. She seems to be searching for something...

Perhaps you could help her?
LanguageData.Sideria_Dialog_Introduction: I am Sideria Bloodthorn, a knight who has lost her way. I once wielded a legendary blade called Atzgand, forged from my own dragon blood and bound by vampiric magic.\n\nBut I lost it in a great battle, and with it, much of my power. Now I wander, seeking a blade worthy enough to awaken my dormant strength.
LanguageData.Sideria_Dialog_Grateful: You have shown me great kindness, feeding me {0} times. Your generosity touches my heart.
LanguageData.Sideria_Dialog_DaysRemaining: If you continue to show me such compassion, in {0} more days, I will pledge myself to your colony out of gratitude.
LanguageData.Sideria_Dialog_LegendarySword: But if you possess a legendary longsword... one that resonates with my blood... I could reforge Atzgand and fight by your side immediately, with my full power restored.
LanguageData.Sideria_ThanksForFood: Sideria: "Thank you for the meal. Your kindness means much to me."
LanguageData.Sideria_BloodResonance_LetterText:
The legendary sword resonates with Sideria's blood, transforming into Atzgand!

Crimson energy surges through the blade as it binds itself to her through biocoding. The sword remembers its master, and her power fully awakens.

In gratitude for this incredible gift, Sideria swears an oath of eternal loyalty to your colony.
LanguageData.Sideria_GratitudeJoin_LetterText: After {0} days of receiving your kindness and hospitality, Sideria has decided to pledge her service to your colony.\n\nThough her legendary blade remains lost and her power not fully restored, her gratitude and honor compel her to fight by your side.
